channel.title: Link's Log
channel.description: Dr. Lance Link's online research journal
channel.dc:creator: llink@jmac.org
channel.dc:subject: llink

item.description: Today I asked lab monkey 45-X how it felt about its recent chess victory against Dr. Baker. He responded by biting my kneecap. (The monkey did, I mean.) I think this could lead to a communications breakthrough. As well as painful swelling, which is unfortunate.

On a tangential note, Dr. Xing's research of purple versus green monkey trans-sociopolitical impact seems to be stalled, having gained no ground for several weeks. Today she learned that her lab assistant never mentioned on his job application that he was colorblind. Oh well.
